entry.title: Volcanic Exfoliant Face Scrub for All Skin Types
entry.summary:
Vendor: NanaGlow Skincare
Type: Face Scrubs
Price: 35.00

Purify, refine and smooth your skin with this gel-based exfoliating Pumice (volcanic) scrub infused with one of nature’s finest natural skin refiners. This scrub is recommended for those who desire a moderately aggressive microdermabrasion that refines skin texture. Fruit enzymes further soften the skin while derived lipids help restore moisture and add a protective barrier following exfoliation.

Skin Types

All skin type, but not recommended for very sensitive skin

    How to use

    Use one to two times a week. Avoiding eye and lip area, apply a small amount of exfoliant to clean skin. Lightly massage in circular motions taking care not to over stimulate the skin. Leave on for up to 10 minutes then rinse with warm water to remove.

    Ingredients

    Aqua (Purified Water), *Glycerin, Silica, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Zinc Oxide, 1,2-Hexanediol (and) Caprylyl Glycol, Decyl Glucoside, Arginine, Dehydroacetic Acid, Iron Oxides, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, *Aleurites Moluccana Seed Oil, *Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, *Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, *Spinacia Oleracea (Spinach) Leaf Extract, Astrocaryum Murumuru Butter, Bromelain/Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit, Pumice.

    * Denotes organic ingredient

entry.title: C-Here Detox Scrub
entry.summary:
Vendor: Geti Cosmetics
Type: Face Scrubs
Price: 20.00

Who needs an expensive day at the spa? A proprietary blend of gentle minerals, detoxifying charcoal and essential oils to invigorate your skin and your senses. Awaken and detoxify your skin and prepare for your next adventure. 

Features + Benefits

  • Absorbs excess oil and dirt that can cause breakouts.
  • Gently detoxifies the skin without over-drying.
  • Great for oily or acne-prone areas.

  • Packaging is 2oz Biodegradable Paper Bag.

How to use

Apply dry scrub directly onto skin or mix 1/2 tsp dry scrub with 1/2 tsp water or facial oil of your choice to form a paste. Stir until smooth and gently scrub onto skin. Wash with warm water and moisturize normally 

Ingredients

Himilayan Salt, Organic Rhassoul Clay Blend, Organic Charcoal Powder, Sodium Bicarbonate, Organic Avocado Oil, Essential Oils.

entry.title: Lavender Fields Soothing Scrub
entry.summary:
Vendor: Geti Cosmetics
Type: Face Scrubs
Price: 20.00

Relax, exhale and wander through lavender fields. Clear your worries away with soothing plant extracts for the skin and mind...

Features + Benefits

  • Soothing essential oils calm irritated skin and minds.
  • Gentle clays help remove excess dirt and oil from deep within pores.
  • Protects skin from harmful UVB rays.
  • Comes in 2oz biodegradable paper bag.

How to use

Apply dry scrub directly onto skin or mix 1/2 tsp dry scrub with 1/2 tsp water or facial oil of your choice to form a paste. Stir until smooth and gently scrub onto skin. Wash with warm water and moisturize normally 

Ingredients

Himilayan Salt, Sodium Bicarbonate, Organic Purple Corn Powder, Lavender Flowers, Essential Oils.

entry.title: Hey Rosé Repairing Scrub
entry.summary:
Vendor: Geti Cosmetics
Type: Face Scrubs
Price: 20.00

Fight free-radicals and repair damaged skin with Hey Rosé Repairing Scrub. 

Features + Benefits

  • Packed with Vitamin C and immune-boosting antioxidants to help skin glow.
  • Gently removes excess dirt & oil from deep inside pores.
  • Age gracefully with Hey Rosé & nature’s best scientists (plants).
  • Comes in 2oz Biodegradable Paper Bag

How to use

Apply dry scrub directly onto skin or mix 1/2 tsp dry scrub with 1/2 tsp water or facial oil of your choice to form a paste. Stir until smooth and gently scrub onto skin. Wash with warm water and moisturize normally 

Ingredients

Himilayan Salt, Sodium Bicarbonate, Organic Beetroot, Organic Rosehip, Evening Primrose Oil, Essential Oils.
